# image

**Instance Property**

The image for the poster view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var image: UIImage? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The size of the poster view is determined by the natural size of the supplied image when no frame or content size is explicitly set.

## Configuring a Poster View

- **imageView**: The image view associated with the poster view.
- **title**: The title for the poster view.
- **subtitle**: The subtitle for the poster view.
